data.text: Hanchu Jerusalem renga pharisee le Balam minchupungei senkhat Jisua kôm an honga male a kôm.
“Ithomo nu ruoisingeiin ei pipungei chongmâk ngei hih an jôm ngâiloi? Sâk an sâk rang khomin balam angin an kut rusûk ngâi mak ngei!” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ithomo Pathien chongpêk jômloiin nin theia chongmâk nin jûi hih?
Pathien'n, ‘Nu nû le na pa mirit tho roh,’ male ‘Tukhom a nû mo, a pa mo, khomâksâm chu that rang ani,’15:4: Jôk 20:12; 21:17; Bal 5:16; Och 20:9 a ti ani.
Hannirese, nangnin chu tutu a nu mo, a pa mo, sanna rang imini neinun a dôna, aniatachu, ‘Mahi Pathien ta kêng ani zoi a tiin chu,’

a nû mo, a pa15:6 a pa; miziek senkhatngeiin an dôna pa mo a nu mo. mo mirit a tho rang nâng khâi mak nin ti ngâia. Ma ang han, nin chongmâk nin jôm theina rangin Pathien chongpêk chu itên nin be ngâiloi ani.
Nangni asarotholngei! Isaiah'n nin chungroi alei misîr hah adik bâkna!”:
“Hi mingei hin an chongbâiin min mirita,15:8-9: Isa 29:13 (LXX)
An miriem minchuna balamngei hah ka balamngei anghan an be sikin
Hanchu Jisua'n lokongei hah a kôm a koi ngeia, an kôm, “Rangâi ungla, rietthei roi!
Mi bâia lût han a minnim ngâi ni maka; manêkin chu a bâi renga hong suok han kêng a minnim ngâi,” a tia.
Male a ruoisingei an honga, a kôm, “No chong han Phariseengei mulung amophop ti ni riet mo?” an tia.
Jisua'n, “Kung murdi invâna ka Pa phun niloi chu phôipaiin om an tih,” tiin a thuona.
“An chungroia nin kângmindoi no roi! Anni ngei hah mitcho ngei ruoipu mitcho an nia; mitcho hah mitcho nanâkin a kairuoiin chu an ruonin khura tâk an tih,”15:14: Luk 6:39 tiin a thuona.
Peter a chonga, “Ma chong omtie hih mi rilminthâr pe roh,” a tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Midangngei nêkin atûnten la vâr uol mak chei.
Nin rietthei loi mo ani? I neinun khom miriem bâia lût murdi chu a phûnga a lûta, masuole chu a nômsena ajôkpai ngâi ani.
Aniatachu neinunngei bâi renga hong suok chu mulungrîl renga hong suok ania, ma neinunngei hah kêng miriem minnim ngâi.15:18: Mat 12:34

A mulungrîl renga mindonna saloi ngei ahong suoka, mangei han kêng a ruoia mi thatnangei, inrênangei, hur inditnangei, inrunangei, mi huongnangei le adikloi teta midang êronangei a musuok ngâi ani.
Hi neinunngei hih, miriem minnim ngâi chu ani. Aniatachu an ti anghan nin kutngei rusûk loia sâknêk nin sâk hin chu miriem minnim ngâi mak,” a tia.
Jisua'n ha mun hah mâkin Tyre le Sidon khopuilienngei kôla ramhuol revêla a sea.
Ha rama om Canaan nuvengte inkhat a kôm a honga, “David Nâipasal! Inrieng ni mu roh, pu! Ka nâinupang ramkhori'n a sûra, changrangintak sabakin aom ani,” tiin ânieka.
Hannirese, Jisua'n chongbâi khat luon thuon mak. A ruoisingei a kôm an honga, “Hi nu hih tîrpai ta roh! Ei nûk mi jûia, michok chuchur!” tiin an ngêna.
Male Jisua'n, “Israel mingei lâia belri inmangngei kôm vai kêng tîr ki ni,” tiin a thuona.
Ha chong hah nuvengtenu han a rietin chu a honga, a ke bula an boka. “Pu, ni san roh!” a tia.
Jisua'n, “Nâingei vâipôl lâk pea uingei kôma pêk chu dik mak,” tiin a thuona.
Nuvengtenu han a kôm, “Pu, maha chu adik, aniatachu uingei khomin an pungei dosâng nuoia vâipôl hâr atâk chu an sâk ngâi mo ka ta,” tiin a thuona.
Masikin Jisua'n a kôm, “Nuvengtenu taksônna lientak dôn ni ni! Nu nuom tak hah na ta rangin sinin om a tih,” a tipea. Male a nâinupang hah ma zoratak han a hong dam pe zoi ani.
Jisua'n ha mun renga hah a sea, Galilee dîl kôla a lôna. Tânga a kala male ân sung zoi.
Mipui tamtak a kôm an honga, kholra, mitcho, achôp, chongtheiloi le damloi dang tamtak Jisua ke bula an hong tuonga; a lei mindam ngei leta.
Mipui ngei han chongtheiloi hong chong, ân-ûng a hong dam, kholra hong lônthei le mitcho hong muthei ngei hah an mûn chu an kamâm sabaka, hanchu Israel Pathien an minpâk zoi ani.

Hanchu Jisua'n a ruoisingei a koia, an kôm, “Mipui ngei hih sûnthum ko kôm an om zoia, atûn hin ite sâk rang an dônloi sikin ku lungkham ngei tatak. Bungêiin tîrpai ngei rang nuom mu-ung, aninôn chu lampuia châmsôl invei an tih,” a tia.
Ruoisingei han a kôm, “Hi dôra mipui vâi minkhopna rangin hi ramchâra hin khonmo sâknêk ei man ranga?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n, “Vâipôl idôrmo nin dôn?” tiin a rekela;
Masikin Jisua'n mipui ngei hah nuoia insung rangin chong a pêka.
Male vâipôltâp sari le nga hah a lâka, Pathien kôm râisânchong rilin a khoia, ruoisingei kôm a pêka; male ruoisingei han mipui ngei kôm an pêka.
An rêngin an sâka an khoppaka. Hanchu ruoisingei han an sâk minieng arnôi tabông sari an rût minsipa.
Asâkngei hah nupangngei le nâipangngei telloiin mi isâng minli an ni.
Masuole chu Jisua'n mipui ngei a tîrpai ngei suolechu rukuonga a chuonga, Magadan ramhuol tieng a se zoi ani.
